SEARCH
Module OOP
Package OOPProject

Class Medication

java.lang.Object
OOPProject.Medication
public class Medication extends Object
The Medication class represents a medication item in the inventory system. It includes details such as the medicine's ID, name, quantity, low stock threshold, and restock request status.

  • Constructor Details

    • Medication

      public Medication(int medicineID, String medicineName, int quantity, int lowQuantity, boolean lowStockAlert, String requestRestock)
      Constructs a new Medication object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      medicineID - The unique ID of the medication.
      medicineName - The name of the medication.
      quantity - The current stock quantity of the medication.
      lowQuantity - The threshold below which the stock is considered low.
      lowStockAlert - Whether a low stock alert is triggered.
      requestRestock - The restock request status for the medication.

    • getLowStockAlert

      public boolean getLowStockAlert()
      Checks whether the low stock alert is triggered.
      Returns:
      true if the stock is below or equal to the threshold, false otherwise.
